title: L&T Finance aims at 25% CAGR, retail lending in focus
description: L&T Finance Ltd aims for a 25% compound annual growth rate (CAGR) in the coming years, focusing on strengthening its retail lending business. The financial services arm of Larsen & Toubro plans to exit the wholesale segment entirely by 2026, becoming a 100% retail non-banking financial company (NBFC). The company introduced a new offering, 'Complete Home Loan', signaling a fresh push in its mortgage business, expected to surpass microfinance in book size.
